title: Transitions & Animations
description: Bring interactivity to your UI by smoothly transitioning properties and creating keyframe-driven animations.

lessons.title: Simple Transitions
lessons.description: Learn how to apply transition to properties for smooth changes on state changes.
lessons.task: Add a hover transition on a button so its background-color fades over 0.3s.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .btn { background: #6200ee; color: white; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border: none; } .btn:hover { background: #3700b3; }

lessons.title: Transition Timing Functions
lessons.description: Explore easing functions like ease, linear, ease-in, ease-out to control animation pacing.
lessons.task: Modify the button to use 'ease-in-out' timing for its transition.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .btn { background: #6200ee; color: white; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border: none; transition: background-color 0.3s; } .btn:hover { background: #03dac6; }

lessons.title: Keyframe Animations Basics
lessons.description: Create named animations using @keyframes and apply them via the animation shorthand.
lessons.task: Define a keyframe named 'bounce' that moves an element up 20px at 50% and apply it to '.ball' over 1s infinite.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .ball { width: 50px; height: 50px; background: #ff0266; border-radius: 50%; margin: 2rem auto; }

lessons.title: Animation Properties Deep Dive
lessons.description: Fine-tune animations with delay, iteration-count, direction, and fill-mode.
lessons.task: Animate '.box' using a 'fade' keyframe over 2s, delay 1s, run twice, and remain visible after.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: sans-serif; padding: 1rem; } .box { width: 100px; height: 100px; background: #4caf50; margin: 2rem auto; }
